joint_involvement.justification: No specific joint counts mentioned in the provided facts.

serology.justification: Both Rheumatoid factor (RF) and Anti-citrullinated protein antibodies (ACPA)/anti-CCP are negative.

duration.justification: No information on duration provided in the facts.

treatment_context.justification: There are no mentions of DMARDs or biologics, and CRP is normal.

classification_rationale: The patient has not met the ACR/EULAR 2010 criteria for Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA). There are no serological markers supporting RA (negative RF and negative anti-CCP), and there is no evidence of inflammation from CRP. Therefore, the classification remains as non-inflammatory arthritis.
